table_description: Details about a building, including address, coordinates, and floor information.

columns.name: buildingId
columns.description: The unique ID of the building.

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description or purpose of the building.

columns.name: etags
columns.description: The etag identifier for the building resource.

columns.name: coordinates
columns.description: The geographic coordinates of the building (latitude, longitude).

columns.name: address
columns.description: The address of the building, including street, city, state, and postal code.

columns.name: floorNames
columns.description: A list of floor names in the building.
